activities:
We process personal information to enable us to provide a service in which we design, test and demonstrate software; promote our services; maintain our accounts and records and to manage our staff.
We process information relevant to the above reasons and/or purposes. This may include:
•	personal details 
•	family details 
•	lifestyle and social circumstances 
•	goods and services 
•	employment and education details 
•	financial details 
•	information necessary for the development, test , support , Consulting ,  Management services including Software,  Infrastructure Management. 
We also process sensitive classes of information that may include physical or mental health details; racial or ethnic origin; religious or other beliefs.
We process personal information about our clients, employees, suppliers and individuals necessary for software development, test, support, Consulting, Management services including Software management and   Infrastructure Management

Who the information may be shared with:

We sometimes need to share the personal information we process with the individual themselves and also with other organizations. Where this is necessary we are required to comply with all aspects of the Safe Harbor Framework. What follows is a description of the types of organizations we may need to share some of the personal information we process with for one or more reasons. 

Where necessary or required we share information with: 
•	family, associates and representatives of the person whose personal data we are processing 
•	suppliers and service providers 
•	professional advisers and consultants 
•	financial organizations 
•	credit reference agencies 
•	debt collection and tracing agencies 
•	employment and recruitment agencies 
•	central government
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: As stated previously, Tech Mahindra We process personal information to enable us to provide a service in which we design, test and demonstrate software; promote our services; maintain our accounts and records and to manage our staff. We process information relevant to the above reasons and/or purposes.  This includes manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Tech Mahindra Has a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
